```{r, include = FALSE}
get_authors = function() {
    pkg_name = local({
        old <- setwd("../pkg")
        tryCatch(litedown:::detect_pkg(), finally = setwd(old))
    })
    d = packageDescription(pkg_name)
    a = litedown:::pkg_authors(d, 'aut', FALSE)
    xfun::join_words(a)
}
```
